lmm.controller.interfaces

Interface IMainController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminStatsController, CreditsController, DetailsFilmController, EditableFilmController, EditableUserController, FavoriteFilmController, FeedbackController, FilmListController, LoginController, MainController, ManageFilmController, ManageUserController, MenuController, UserStatsController

    public interface IMainController
    Interface that define the MainController.
    Author:
    Roberto Reibaldi, Luca Pascucci

      • changeView

        void changeView(java.lang.Integer fromView,
              java.lang.Integer toView,
              java.lang.Object item)
        This method have the function to change the current view when requested.
        Parameters:
        fromView - this parameter define the current view.
        toView - this parameter define the view that we want to go.
        item - this parameter pass the items of the view.
